column5: Congrats to Canada!!!The most Gold Medals ever in a winter Olympics by a single nation!!!!Hockey is Canada's Game!!!!!Although Ryan Miller from the US does deserve a Gold Medal!Fish ON!!!

It was a great game, lot of drama..I kind of figured as the OT was progressing that it was just a matter of time before Canada scored..but how could the goal of been better than your best player beating our best goalie The Olympics as a whole was good..the only things other than hockey that I watched were the down hill skiing, the bobsleds and I even started to get into curling..maybe that was because of Cheryl Bernard..
Maybe fishing should be an Olympic sport?!!!!
I defininitly like the fishing thing...
